actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to allow an adult in a family or household to attest to the citizenship status of any member of the family or household as part of the process for verifying the eligibility of the family member for certain public assistance benefits.

summary.text: Amends title XI of the Social Security Act to allow an adult from each family or household applying for benefits under part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act (SSA), SSA title XIX (Medicaid), or certain other public assistance programs to attest to the citizenship status of other members of the family or household.

titles.title: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to allow an adult in a family or household to attest to the citizenship status of any member of the family or household as part of the process for verifying the eligibility of the family member for certain public assistance benefits.
